THOMAS HILL  BEng, MEng  
Exceptional Chemical Engineering Graduate  
 
pm15teh@outlook.com  / 07973  445644  / Able to work across the UK  
 
PROFILE  
An outstanding Chemical Engineering graduate with experience in testing, compliance and quality improvement.  
With a professional outlook and proactive nature, I have consistently met project deadlines whilst improving quality 
and efficiency to enhanc e the business.   My blend of p rofessional exper tise and significant academic achievements 
will add value to any organisation.  Able to work across the UK, I am looking to apply  my skills and experience  to a 
challenging  role to start my career .   
 
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS  
• Evaluated and i mprove d material testing methodology compliance at TE Connectivit y.  This resulted in valid , 
standardised and repeatable dielectric  strength  testing , align ed with ISO , meeting engineering guidelines .   
• Completed over 60 projects of 2 days to 12 weeks durin g my placement , as sole materials tester .  These  were 
essential in the reformulation of numerous materials used in products in the medium and low voltage range.  
• Supported  the establishment of a new production facility in India by c omplet ing quality and material testing , 
collaborat ing with team and remote colleagues  to maintain quality standards , improv ing the unit’s  efficiency.  
• Academic awards: Head of School Excellence Sc holarship  2015  to 2020 , Griffiths Memorial Prize for Science , 
Harold Brodrick -Pittard Prize for Chemistry , and Margaret Bryce Smith Charity Award for Outstanding 
Achievement at A -Level  
 
SKILLS  SUMMARY  
• Materials testing, methodology  and compliance  
• Process  review  and quality improvement  
• Able to write professional  and persuasive  reports outlining complex findings  
• Understand s client needs and deliver s excellent service  
• Meets tight  project  deadlines and skilfully co-ordinate s resources to achieve results  
• Confident collaborator ; able to engage with stakeholders  at all levels , locally and globally  
• Adaptable , flexible  and resilient  in new and  fast-moving environments  
• Proactive , willing to take  responsibility  and manag e projects  
• Engineering software for modelling and simulation : ANSYS Fluent, Aspen, Visio , Mercury , MATLAB  
• IChemE  member  
• Microsoft Office suite incl. Excel VBA experience  
• A2+ German language proficiency  
 
CAREER HISTORY  
Material Science Engineer  
TE Connectivity, Munich  / 2018 – 2019  
 
Full-time p lacement in the Research and Development department of the Energy Business Unit . 
 
Key responsibilities : 
• Material property testing and report writing for qualification and requalification of material used in products 
and components in TE Connectivity’s  energy business unit  
• Characterisation of materials and products using physical, chemical, electrical, thermal and analytical testing  
• Develop ment and test ing of new material formulation s and participation in material replacement projects  
• Evaluat ed compliance of internal testin g method ologies with respect to international standards  (ISO)  
• Redesign ed material testing procedure and produc ed documents outlining material testing  protocols  
• Organising and operating long -term studies on energy materials and material properties  
 
Key achi evements : 
• Met stringent project deadlines across  multiple  concurrent  projects, co -ordinating equipment and scheduling  
• Played a key role in  the establishment of a new production facility in India, using industrial and academic 
experience to improve plant efficiency  and product  quality  
• Optimised performance, efficiency and customer experience by collaborating with colleagues in different 
business units and industrial sectors, both globally and locally  
• Successfully a dapted to unique challenges associated with  relocation, foreign languages and business 
cultures in a workplace where English was not the primary language  
 
Sales Assistant/Brand Representative  
Hollister Co. , Liverpool / 2014 – 2017  (part -time whilst studying)  
 
Represent ed the brand in a professional manner , provid ed excellent

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
